W. K. KELLOGG FOUNDATION
250 CHAMPION STREET
BATTLE CREEK, MICHIGAN
DIVISION OF EDUCATION
July 31, 1959
MAURICE F. SEAY
PHONE WO 8-81
DIRECTOR
Mr. Harry J. Skornia, Executive Director
National Association of Educational Broadcasters
University of Illinois
14 Gregory Hall
Urbana, Illinois
Dear Harry:
Thanks for this copy of the forthcoming NAEB network offerings.
You and your colleagues have surely done a lot of work and have
what seems to me to he a great program.
As I recall my childhood days when the word "evolution‚Äù was
indeed a had one, I am impressed that now you can have a whole
program "Symposium on Evolution." How my father would have loved
this program in 19201 ]
I am still planning on attending your television conference in
Washington on September 9 and 10. The Statler has indicated no
space available so I am now writing to the Mayflower for a room
on the 9th.
What about hotel reservations for your Detroit convention? When
should I arrive and when should I leave?
Sincerely and with best wishes
Maurice F. Seay
MFS/fh
